text: Pall Mall, Rothmans and Kent now #3, #4 and #6 cigarette brands globally (by volume), with $ PM's Marlboro still a solid #1 of course and JT's Winston #2. PM's L&M is in fifth place. Rothmans performance has been remarkable as this has been a focus brand for only a couple of years pic.twitter.com/mYGb8ajif7

This explains part of $ PM's quick deceleration in HTU shipments in Japan: they don't have the market to themselves anymore. BAT solid no. 2 now in heated tobacco in Japan (and globally as Japan = 70% of global HT market).
Japanese market: BAT is nibbling away at $ PM's market share in heated tobacco with glo, while JT has had less success with Ploom. pic.twitter.com/kA3mIASAfp
